title: Understanding Schizotypal Personality Disorder
text: Schizotypal personality disorder is characterized by a specific set of behaviors and thought patterns. Consider what makes this disorder unique compared to others.

title: Key Features of Schizotypal Personality Disorder
text: Think about the behaviors and beliefs that are often associated with schizotypal personality disorder. How do these differ from other personality disorders?

hintAnswer: odd or eccentric behavior, unusual beliefs or magical thinking, social and interpersonal difficulties, and a tendency toward perceptual and cognitive distortions
title: Identifying Schizotypal Characteristics
text: Which of the following best describes schizotypal personality disorder?
choices: pervasive pattern of distrust and suspicion of others
pattern of detachment from social relationships and a limited range of emotional expression
odd or eccentric behavior, unusual beliefs or magical thinking, social and interpersonal difficulties, and a tendency toward perceptual and cognitive distortions
false belief that coincidental events relate to oneself
